DOC.brief_summary: The biodegradable ABSORB scaffold characterize great strut thickness , great flexibility compare XIENCE stent . Due fragility inflate pressure ABSORB scaffold limit suitable lesion well prepared . This study assess incidence malapposed stent-struts , frequency stent-underexpansion edge dissection ABSORB implantation compare XIENCE stent .
DOC.brief_title: Performance Bioabsorbable Vascular Scaffolds ( Absorb ) Compared Xience Stents - Optical Coherence Tomography Study
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria implant Absorb scaffold : age < 55 year OR lesion length > 24mm OR multiple lesion treat
